name: kee-berry
effect: Held: When the holder is hit by a physical move, increases its Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Held: When the holder is hit by a physical move, increases its Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder’s Defense if it’s hit with a physical move.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder’s Defense if it’s hit with a physical move.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder’s Defense if it’s hit with a physical move.
